subject: Complete high-priority TODO items: UI reorganization and export improvements
body:
- Reorder Presets tab: Layout section now first, Complete Designs second
- Filter Complete Designs by current layout type (fullbleed/rows/columns)
- Separate platform selector into its own card section
- Collapse platform selector and categories by default
- Replace Download All with Download Multiple with platform selection UI
- Add automatic cell assignment cleanup when layout reduces cell count

https://claude.ai/code/session_01P5NbukbSbYZRMc5TjYGgDP
title: Complete high-priority TODO items: UI reorganization and export improvements
